The source files are available on Github (https://github.com/jeroenclaes/R_crashcourse_for_linguists).

## Recommended literature (available upon request)
- Baayen, R. H. (2008). *Analyzing Linguistic Data: A Practical Introduction to Statistics Using R.* Cambridge: Cambridge University Press.	
- Field, A., Miles, J., & Field, Z. (2012). *Discovering statistics using R*. New York, NY/London: SAGE.
- Gries, S. Th. (2009). *Quantitative corpus linguistics with R.* Berlin/Boston, MA: De Gruyter.	
 - Gries, S. Th. (2013). *Statistics for linguistics with R.* Berlin/Boston, MA: De Gruyter.	
- Levshina, N. (2015). *How to do linguistics with R.* Amsterdam/Philadelphia, PA: John Benjamins.	
- Urdan, T. C. (2010). *Statistics in plain English.* New York, NY: Routledge.
